name: Zefira
description:
Having nearly lost her life adventuring, the half-elf Zefira decides to settle down with the man who helped save her.

However, after getting married, Zefira wants to help support her husband's fledgling writing career.

So now she decides to once again take up adventuring in order to bring in some much needed money.Features:
  • Classic RPG Experience
  • Skill Tree System
  • Random enchantments on dropped equipment
  • Weapon enhancement system using materials
